feed.title: Thoughts from Production
feed.subtitle: Welcome Richard Finlay Tweed's thoughts on Cloud Native Software, Kubernetes, Production and whatever else he's been tinkering with.

entry.title: Welcome to Tales From Prod!
entry.content: This blog is for rants about Kubernetes, Cloud Native applications, DevSecOps and whatever ends up being a “Tale from Prod”
entry.summary: This blog is for rants about Kubernetes, Cloud Native applications, DevSecOps and whatever ends up being a “Tale from Prod”
